page.title: 05St. John's Primary School
page.content:
{St. John's School}is a primary school of about 110 pupils. There are five classes, five teachers and a headteacher. The pupils start school at the{age}of four and a half years and leave at eleven years.
The pupils learn{Mathematics, English, {French, and general subjects. Sports include cricket, football, volleyball, short tennis, badminton, netball, longjump, highjump, running (long and short distance) and swimming. The school owns 3 BBC model B{computers. There are two in the infant classes and one in the top class. We have {music lessons}taught by peripatetic teachers. The pupils learn the cello, the violin, the clarinet, the recorder and the piano. An average of one in five children learn musical instruments.
